onSuccess.displayText:
Although he had his own reservations, {Player} obeys the order, finding {Knight1} alone in her quarters. She tries to talk {Player} out of it, but to no avail. The guards had already surrounded her tent. {Player} brings her to the inquisitors, and this would be the last time that the two meet.

{Player} goes on to fight in the {Kingdom#Adjective} Crusades, turning over insurmountable odds and winning battles where the army was clearly outgunned and outnumbered. At the end of the war, the kingdom of {Kingdom#Name} achieved a pyrrhic victory. The sheer death and destruction left the region in a state of devastation, which took several years to repair. {Player} was hailed as the hero of {Kingdom#Name}, which laid the bloody foundations of their vast empire, which today stretches across the horizon, as far as the eye can see.
